eosDAC Airdrop and Burn
20 May 2018

It is the vision of eosDAC that EOS.IO block production should be open for everyone to contribute and benefit. To realise this vision, eosDAC is an evolving Decentralised Autonomous Community (DAC) focused on EOS.IO Block Production serving the EOS communities worldwide.

Read more ↗
eosDAC Ltd Operational Structure in Place for eosDAC Launch
18 May 2018

On the 1 st June 2018, eosDAC ERC20 Ethereum-based tokens will be frozen. Over the days that follow, eosDAC will launch as a Decentralised Autonomous Community on the EOS blockchain and all token holders will then be able to take control of their eosDAC tokens and begin to utilise them on the new EOS-based chain.

To realise this concept the EOS software has been developed by Block.one led by Daniel Larimer and Brendan Blumer.
